recipe_name: Chargrilled asparagus with olive oil and balsamic vinegar
author: Tony Tobin
method: Drizzle the asparagus with the olive oil and season well with salt and freshly ground black pepper. Heat a griddle pan until smoking hot and griddle the asparagus for about five minutes, or until charred on all sides. To serve, place the asparagus onto a plate and drizzle with balsamic vinegar.
ingredients: 8-10 asparagus spears,  1 tbsp olive oil,  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  2 tsp balsamic vinegar, to serve
